appVersion.title: App version
appVersion.default: the `version` property of the `package.json` file or `latest`

engineVersion.title: Engine version
engineVersion.default: the `version` of the dependency `@latechforce/engine` of the `package.json` file

ConfigSchema.description: This is the configuration of the engine.
ConfigSchema.title: Config

AutomationSchema.description: Defines an automation workflow with triggers and actions
AutomationSchema.title: Automation

TriggerAutomationSchema.description: Union type of all possible triggers that can start automations
TriggerAutomationSchema.title: Trigger

RecordCreatedDatabaseServiceTriggerAutom.description: A trigger that fires when a record is created in a database
RecordCreatedDatabaseServiceTriggerAutom.title: Record Created

ApiCalledHttpServiceTriggerAutomationSch.description: A trigger that fires when an API is called
ApiCalledHttpServiceTriggerAutomationSch.title: Api Called

WebhookCalledHttpServiceTriggerAutomatio.description: A trigger that fires when a webhook is called
WebhookCalledHttpServiceTriggerAutomatio.title: Webhook Called

CronTimeTickedScheduleServiceTriggerAuto.description: A trigger that fires when a cron time is ticked
CronTimeTickedScheduleServiceTriggerAuto.title: Cron Time Ticked

InviteeCreatedCalendlyIntegrationTrigger.description: A trigger that fires when an invitee is created in Calendly
InviteeCreatedCalendlyIntegrationTrigger.title: Invitee Created

TablePageCreatedNotionIntegrationTrigger.description: A trigger that fires when a table page is created in Notion
TablePageCreatedNotionIntegrationTrigger.title: Table Page Created

FormWebhookReceivedJotformIntegrationTri.description: A trigger that fires when form webhook is received in Jotform
FormWebhookReceivedJotformIntegrationTri.title: Form Webhook Received

BookingCreatedYouCanBookMeIntegrationTri.description: A trigger that fires when a booking is created in YouCanBookMe
BookingCreatedYouCanBookMeIntegrationTri.title: Booking Created

ActionAutomationSchema.description: Union type of all possible actions that can be performed in automations
ActionAutomationSchema.title: Action

IntegrationActionAutomationSchema.description: Union type of all possible integration actions that can be performed in automations
IntegrationActionAutomationSchema.title: Integration

GetCompanyPappersIntegrationActionAutoma.description: Retrieves company information using Pappers integration
GetCompanyPappersIntegrationActionAutoma.title: Get Company

CreateClientQontoIntegrationActionAutoma.description: Creates a new client in Qonto with the specified details
CreateClientQontoIntegrationActionAutoma.title: Create Client

RetrieveAttachmentQontoIntegrationAction.description: Retrieves an attachment using Qonto integration
RetrieveAttachmentQontoIntegrationAction.title: Retrieve Attachment

UpdatePageNotionIntegrationActionAutomat.description: Updates a page in Notion with the specified properties
UpdatePageNotionIntegrationActionAutomat.title: Update Page

SendEmailMailGoogleIntegrationActionAuto.description: Sends an email using Google Mail integration
SendEmailMailGoogleIntegrationActionAuto.title: Send Email

CreatePaymentGoCardlessIntegrationAction.description: Creates a new payment in GoCardless with the specified details
CreatePaymentGoCardlessIntegrationAction.title: Create Payment

ListPaymentsGoCardlessIntegrationActionA.description: Lists payments using GoCardless integration with optional filters
ListPaymentsGoCardlessIntegrationActionA.title: List Payments

ServiceActionAutomationSchema.description: Union type of all possible service actions that can be performed in automations
ServiceActionAutomationSchema.title: Service

RunJavascriptCodeServiceActionAutomation.description: Executes JavaScript code with the specified input
RunJavascriptCodeServiceActionAutomation.title: Run JavaScript

RunTypescriptCodeServiceActionAutomation.description: Executes TypeScript code with the specified input
RunTypescriptCodeServiceActionAutomation.title: Run TypeScript

ReadRecordDatabaseServiceActionAutomatio.description: Reads a record from the specified database table
ReadRecordDatabaseServiceActionAutomatio.title: Read Record

CreateRecordDatabaseServiceActionAutomat.description: Creates a new record in the specified database table with the given fields
CreateRecordDatabaseServiceActionAutomat.title: Create Record

name.description: The unique identifier for the table
name.title: Name

schema.description: The database schema where the table is located
schema.title: Schema

fields.description: Array of field definitions for the table
fields.title: Fields

TableSchema.description: Defines the structure of a database table
TableSchema.title: Table

FieldTableSchema.description: Union type of all possible field types that can be used in forms and tables
FieldTableSchema.title: Field

DateTimeFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores a date and time.
DateTimeFieldTableSchema.title: Date time

EmailFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores an email address.
EmailFieldTableSchema.title: Email

formula.description: The formula expression to calculate the field value.
formula.title: Formula

output.description: The output type configuration for the formula field.
output.title: Output

FormulaFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that calculates a value based on a formula.
FormulaFieldTableSchema.title: Formula

OutputFormulaFieldTableSchema.description: Represents the output type configuration of a formula field.
OutputFormulaFieldTableSchema.title: Output

LongTextFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores multiple lines of text.
LongTextFieldTableSchema.title: Long text

table.description: The name of the table to link to.
table.title: Table

MultipleLinkedRecordFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that links to multiple records in another table.
MultipleLinkedRecordFieldTableSchema.title: Multiple linked record

NumberFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores a numeric value.
NumberFieldTableSchema.title: Number

formula.description: The formula expression to calculate the aggregated value.
formula.title: Formula

multipleLinkedRecord.description: The name of the multiple linked record field to aggregate values from.
multipleLinkedRecord.title: Multiple Linked Record

linkedRecordField.description: The name of the field in the linked record table to aggregate values from.
linkedRecordField.title: Linked Record Field

output.description: The output type configuration for the rollup field.
output.title: Output

RollupFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that aggregates values from linked records.
RollupFieldTableSchema.title: Rollup

OutputRollupFieldTableSchema.description: Represents the output type configuration of a rollup field.
OutputRollupFieldTableSchema.title: Output

SingleLineTextFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores a single line of text.
SingleLineTextFieldTableSchema.title: Single line text

table.description: The name of the table to link to.
table.title: Table

SingleLinkedRecordFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that links to a single record in another table.
SingleLinkedRecordFieldTableSchema.title: Single linked record

SingleSelectFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that allows selecting a single option from a predefined list.
SingleSelectFieldTableSchema.title: Single select

MultipleSelectFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that allows selecting multiple options from a predefined list.
MultipleSelectFieldTableSchema.title: Multiple select

CheckboxFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a boolean checkbox field in forms and tables.
CheckboxFieldTableSchema.title: Checkbox

MultipleAttachmentFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores multiple attachments.
MultipleAttachmentFieldTableSchema.title: Multiple attachment

UrlFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores an URL.
UrlFieldTableSchema.title: Url

SingleAttachmentFieldTableSchema.description: Represents a field that stores a single attachment.
SingleAttachmentFieldTableSchema.title: Single attachment

BucketSchema.description: Type alias for bucket storage configuration
BucketSchema.title: Bucket
